title: Love After Marriage
alternative_title: Love First / Marriage Before Love / Marry to Find Love / 先婚后爱 / 대표님, 저 결혼했어요 [연재]
status: Love First / Marriage Before Love / Marry to Find Love / 先婚后爱 / 대표님, 저 결혼했어요 [연재]
description:
Description :
        
She's been married for three years, yet she doesn't know who her husband is. During an unexpected blind date, she got to know Long Zehuan, a super-rich CEO! The man leans in and asks in a low voice, “What do you call me?”
“Hub… hubby?”
“Wrong!” The next day she wakes up in anger: What does it feel like to marry a man who enjoys role-playing?
